terrapeer.vui.j3dui.navigate
Class AvatarCameraControl

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.navigate.AvatarCameraControl
public class AvatarCameraControl
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a controller (draggers, filters, and mappers) for a Camera, which presumably has a view and possibly a headlight attached.

By default, camera thrust is directly controlled with arrow Y, no modifiers, through an acceleration filter; camera attitude-roll and pitch are controlled with mouse X and Y, no modifiers, through a rate filter; and, camera attitude-yaw is controlled through arrow X, no modifiers, through a rate filter.

Title: TerraPeer

Description: P2P 3D System

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

Constructor Detail

AvatarCameraControl

public AvatarCameraControl(javax.media.j3d.Canvas3D display,
                           AvatarCamera camera)
Constructs a AvatarCameraControl for a source display and target camera.

Parameters:
display - Display serving as the event source for drags. Typically this is the display of the view that is attached to the camera. Null if none, but have to eventually add one to all draggers and cancelers.
camera - Target fly camera. Never null.
